info.author: Jace Browning
info.description:
xman
====

Manage all your dependency managers.

|yodawg|

| |Build Status|
| |Coverage Status|
| |Scrutinizer Code Quality|
| |PyPI Version|
| |PyPI Downloads|

Getting Started
---------------

Requirements
~~~~~~~~~~~~

-  Python 3.5+

Installation
~~~~~~~~~~~~

xman can be installed with pip:

::

    $ pip install xman

or directly from the source code:

::

    $ git clone https://github.com/jacebrowning/xman.git
    $ cd xman
    $ python setup.py install

Basic Usage
-----------

After installation, the package can imported:

::

    $ python
    >>> import xman
    >>> xman.__version__

Documentation
-------------

Read the full documentation
`here <http://jacebrowning.github.io/xman>`__.

.. |Build Status| image:: http://img.shields.io/travis/jacebrowning/xman/develop.svg
   :target: https://travis-ci.org/jacebrowning/xman
.. |Coverage Status| image:: http://img.shields.io/coveralls/jacebrowning/xman/develop.svg
   :target: https://coveralls.io/r/jacebrowning/xman
.. |Scrutinizer Code Quality| image:: http://img.shields.io/scrutinizer/g/jacebrowning/xman.svg
